write_up: Greys are not very well known among indie fans, at least not like some mainstream success stories, but it’s not for a lack of hooks. Usually more suited to an aesthetic of hard punk rock, ‘Erosion’ shows a sweet melodical instinct that’s closer to the alternative rock trends of the millennium, reminiscent in a good way of ‘… And you will know us by the trail of the dead’, but also original and artistically strong. Canada.
